ruleArticles:
<js>
let url = java.hexDecodeToString(result)+'';
url=surl()+url.replace(/^http.{4}[^\/]+/,'');
let webrh=cache.get(url)+'';
if (webrh.length<6999) {
webrh=java.ajax(url);
webrh=rrcheck(url, webrh);
let webr = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(webrh);
webr = webr.select('.posts>.post');
if (webr=='') {result=[];}
else {
	let fmurl = webr.first().select("img").attr("src");
if (fmurl=='') {result=[];}
else {
	//æ­£ç¡®ç½‘ç»œåŠ è½½
	result=webr;
	let cfm=true;
if (/animation_list\/all|dt_list\/all/.test(url)) {
cache.put(url,webrh,3600*24*3);}
else if (/content_news\/all/.test(url)) {
	let fmurlmr = result.get(1)?.select("img").attr("src");
source.put('fmurlmr',fmurlmr);
cache.put(url,webrh,3600*24*2);}
else if (/fc_search\/all/.test(url)) {
cache.put(url,webrh,3600*24*2);}
else if (/uncensored_list\/all|chinese_list\/all/.test(url)) {
cache.put(url,webrh,3600*24);}
else {
	if (!url.includes("_random")) {
	cfm=false;
	switch (String(Date.now()).substr(-1)) {
	case "1": source.put('fmsj1',fmurl);break;
	case "2": source.put('fmsj2',fmurl);break;
	case "3": source.put('fmsj3',fmurl);break;}
	}
cache.put(url,webrh,3600*4);
//å…¶ä»–åˆ†ç±»
}

if (cfm) source.put('fm'+url,fmurl);
//æœ‰å°é¢
}
//æœ‰dom
}
//æ²¡ç¼“å­˜
} else {
	let mk=cache.getFromMemory(url+'2')||0;
	cache.putMemory(url+'2',mk+1);
	let tmh = new Date().getHours();
	if (/content_news\/all|animation_list\/all|fc_search\/all/.test(url)) {
		mk>3&&cache.delete(url);}
	else if (mk>1||tmh>1&&tmh<4) {
		cache.deleteMemory(url+'2');
		cache.delete(url);}
		webrh = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(webrh);
		result = webrh.select('.posts>.post');		
}
result
</js>
ruleContent:
let uu = java.hexDecodeToString(result) + ''; result = uu.replace(/^https|[\/\.\_\-\:\s]|html$/g, ''); let ssurl = surl(); let url = ssurl + uu; if (uu.startsWith("http")) url = uu; let webr = cache.get(url) + ''; if (webr.length < 6999) { webr = java.ajax(url); webr = rrcheck(url, webr); cache.put(url, webr, 3600 * 24 * 20); } let title = gets('h1.0@text', webr); let pimg = gets('#player-wrap img@src', webr); let yimgs = gets('.ut1_img_content_smallcg@html', webr).replaceAll('https://fchost', 'http://cdn.cdnjson.com/pic.html?url=fchost'); let jianjie = gets('.posts-inner-details-text,.actor-right-details-images,.posts-inner-details-text@html', webr).replaceAll('https://pics.', 'http://cdn.cdnjson.com/pic.html?url=pics.'); let posts = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(webr).select('.video .posts'); posts.select('video').remove(); //è·å–é…ç½® var info = source.getLoginInfoMap(); result = ` ${rssArticle.sort}
${info['æ’­æ”¾å™¨'] == 'é»˜è®¤'?'':''}

${title}

${info['é¢„è§ˆæˆªå›¾']=='âšª'?yimgs:''} ${jianjie}

â–¼éšæœºä¸»é¢˜â–¼

${posts}

`;
